titleStmt.title: A message from the Lord General Crumwel to the communalty of the kingdom of Scotland. With the advance of Col. Hackers regiment to the borders. And a fight between a party of the Parliaments horse, and some of the Scots forces, on the borders of Scotland also the Lord Generals alarm to the Scots and a proclamation made at the cross of Edenburgh touching the coronation of their King.
titleStmt.author: T. B.

titleStmt.title: A message from the Lord General Crumwel to the communalty of the kingdom of Scotland. With the advance of Col. Hackers regiment to the borders. And a fight between a party of the Parliaments horse, and some of the Scots forces, on the borders of Scotland also the Lord Generals alarm to the Scots and a proclamation made at the cross of Edenburgh touching the coronation of their King.
titleStmt.author: T. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.J. and are to be sold at the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
